channel.title: Gnome on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Gnome on Today I Learned

item.description: That sometimes ssh sessions with x-forwarding don’t unlock the GNOME “login” keyring. This can lead to “Cannot create an item in a locked collection” errors. The way to fix the problem is to: printf "password: " read -s password printf "%s" "$password" | gnome-keyring-daemon --replace --unlock
